item.title: CVE-2024-32140|2024-04-15T07:04:39.546Z -- libsyn -- libsyn%20publisher%20hub
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Libsyn Libsyn Publisher Hub allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Libsyn Publisher Hub: from n/a through 1.4.4.
